name: Woocommerce Migs
author: Infoway LLC

sections.description: This is Woocommerce Migs Payment Gateway extension which helps to make payment securely using mastercards.
sections.installation:
1.Download the Netaxept Payment Gateway plugin zip file and extract to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
2.Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress Admin.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

1.Download the Netaxept Payment Gateway plugin zip file and extract to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
2.Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress Admin.

Is it woo commerce supported?

Yes. It is a woo commerce plugin.

Do I need to install woocommerce plugin?

Yes, you should install woocommerce plugin first.

short_description: Woocommerce Migs allows securely payment using your Credit Card.
description: This is Woocommerce Migs Payment Gateway extension which helps to make payment securely using mastercards.

screenshots.caption: At the bottom you will get different payment gateways where you have to select Credit Card with Gateway ID "migs".
Then go to settings of this gateway. Fill the form with credentials as it is shown on the above screenshort.
This is Front-End Checkout Page where you have to select Credit Card-Mastercard worldwide.

tags.migs-payment-gateway-integration-with-wo: MIGS Payment Gateway Integration with WooCommerce
